Site Structure/Layout¶

This section will list the languages and other tools used, the motivation behind using them, and how they are implemented.

Languages/Tools Used¶

Backend¶

  • Python
  • Django
  • PostgreSQL

On the back end, this site is implemented using Python with the Django framework and a PostgreSQL database.

Frontend¶

  • HTML/CSS
  • JavaScript/jQuery/Ajax

On the front end, HTML and CSS are used to render content that function based on JavaScript and jQuery code. Ajax is used to communicate with the back end to send data back and forth.

Structure¶
